price: (18) Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return [to the right path].
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
